name: Mom Is Coming!
description:
This is my first public game in my first game jam.

You play as a son/daughter that has excactly 1 minute to do all the chores before mom comes home. You are going to have to complete them as fast as possible if you want to avoid making your mom mad.

Try getting top 5 on the leaderboard (I dear you).

I don't have much experience so I appreciate any feedback.

Note: on your math homework you have to press enter to confirm

Bug: having two spaces together will most likely mess up the copy homework level 

Credits:

Music from Free To Use Music, Track: Kyoto by Pratzapp & Another Kid, https://youtu.be/rlxvg-Sy-sY

Timer ring: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ck9iaIKH_u8

Appluause: https://www.zapsplat.com/music/large-audience-applauding-cheering-and-whistling-...
